Basic Settings

You can configure the following basic workstation parameters:

l The type of access to remote patients.

Set the type of access to remote patients

l Automatic Log Off: The period of time that the application remains in a logged on state when the system is idle (no user input). After this period, a user will need to log on before working with the chart.

Set automatic log off interval

l Screen display when no user is logged on. This setting affects Anesthesia Manager, PACU Manager, Critical Care Manager and Preop Manager.

l CCOW options

These options are not currently used. (Including the “Remote Access for non-local bedside patients” option.)
